trans-unit.source: Defines constants that indicate how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 定義常數，表示要如何顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" />。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> types to indicate the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>類型以指出資料格的外觀時，就會在編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, the cell displays the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在編輯模式中，資料格會顯示主控<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> mimics the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果不處於編輯模式，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> 會模仿 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> is displayed with a drop-down button but does not otherwise mimic the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果不處於編輯模式，會將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> 與下拉式按鈕一起顯示，但不會利用其他方式模仿 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> 控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> is displayed without a drop-down button.
trans-unit.target: 如果不處於編輯模式，會顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" />，但不會有下拉式按鈕。
